Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: One model of DM pathogenesis suggests that RNAs from the expanded allele create a gain - of - function mutation by the inappropriate binding of proteins to the CUG repeats .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| DM (Myotonic Dystrophy) |

In this paragraph, the disease entity mentioned is Myotonic Dystrophy (DM). The paragraph describes a model of its pathogenesis, which involves the creation of a gain-of-function mutation due to RNAs from the expanded allele binding inappropriately to proteins and the CUG repeats.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Myotonic Dystrophy (DM) |

In this paragraph, the only clearly mentioned disease entity is Myotonic Dystrophy (DM). The paragraph describes a model of its pathogenesis, which involves the creation of a gain-of-function mutation due to RNAs from the expanded allele binding inappropriately to proteins and the CUG repeats. Other entities such as "model," "DM pathogenesis," and "gain-of-function mutation" do not refer to specific diseases.
